section.p:
In order to use FlowLayout, just create a FlowLayout node at the end of the list of child components. No need to specify which ones to add, they all get added automatically, e.g.:
JPanel: - JPanel(name=panel1,groupTitle=Flow layout components): - JLabel(text=Label 1) - JButton(text=Button 1) - JLabel(text=Label 2) - JButton(text=Button 2) - JLabel(text=Label 3) - JButton(text=Button 4) - JLabel(text=Label 5) - JButton(text=Button 5) - FlowLayout(alignment=left,hgap=30,vgap=30,alignOnBaseline=true)
